  • Salon:

When you click a row, will load the data that was fetched from the API (or any source) that it's stored on the library in order to avoid an unnecesary re-fetch of the data "clicked".

You can do anything, open a modal and fill the inputs with the according row, save the data as "global" in order to access to another pages that needs this data, etc.

The only situations when the library request information to the API or source information, it's when You request a page (by input or buttons navigation) and when you "configurate" the table in order that the data it's sorted by the server (API)
